Or is it just the DPI option enabled?

TextBody:
Hello,

You can try to remove the users from the CAP policy to allow them to login.
Or you can create an offline temporary password for the user.

Kind regards
__________________
Andrei Pop | Technical Support Engineer
Netwrix Endpoint Protector

Hello Amy,

I wanted to check in regarding your support ticket 00440436. We haven’t heard from you in a while, and I just wanted to see if you still need assistance with this issue.

If you’re still experiencing problems or have any updates to share, please let me know. If the issue has been resolved, I can go ahead and close the ticket on my end.

Please feel free to reply to this email with any updates or questions. We’re here to help you get the most out of your Netwrix products.

Ticket Number: 00440436
Ticket Subject: Allow specific users or groups to access google services
Ticket Details: The DPI configuration in our DLP has a global configuration about google, according to our current configuration, everyone can not log in to gmail and google drive on our PC. But one or two users always has this need. Without uninstalling the client, can we allow specific users or groups to access google services, how to configure?

Thank you!

Andrei Pop
Technical Support Engineer
